pageContext.claim: “I would not sign Graham-Cassidy if it did not include coverage of pre-existing conditions. It does! A great Bill. Repeal & Replace.”
pageContext.analysis: This is misleading. Depending on the state, the protection for preexisting conditions could be the same under Graham-Cassidy — or people with cancer or other serious illnesses could find themselves in a high-risk pool being charged extraordinarily high premiums.
